name: "Main Path" the game!
description:
welcome to "main path" the game. its about helping your friend the AI cube to find to the end. you can do so by moving around the light grey piece so the AI can find its way and reach the goal

controls:

you can click on the grey pieces to lift them up and move them to a new location. you can now click again to lay them down

 and use A and D to move from side to side

you can press ctrl + R to restart the game

this is more meant like a prototype than an actual game because I had very limited time to create it; therefore, it is very short and simple, but I still hope you will like it (:
